page.title: 07BURNOPFIELD SHOPS/BUSES
page.content: There are twenty three shops in Burnopfield at this time.The Cooperative Sociey Store closed in 1984 which disappointed many people.The shops include several general dealers,two butchers,a pet shop,three hairdressers,launderette, fish shop,Chinese take away,a video shop,two newsagents,two post offices,a wool shop and a fruit shop. There are six bus routes operating in Burnopfield.They are; 1.{708 Newcastle/Lanchester. Hourly. 2.{770 Newcastle/Castleside. Hourly. 3.{772 Newcastle/Castleside. Hourly. 4.{771 Newcastle/Consett. Hourly. 5.{X11 Newcastle/Consett. Hourly. 6.{715 Stanley/R'land's Gill.Hourly. { }There are also the following which operate via Pickering Nook. 1.{705 Newcastle/South Stanley.Hourly. 2.{706 Newcastle/Quaking Hses. Hourly.
